Label: Required Speed
Title: The target speed for the rotary axis

Label: Acceleration Time
Title: Time taken to accelerate from rest to required speed

Label: Run Time
Title: Time the rotary axis runs at required speed

Label: Deceleration Time
Title: Time taken to decelerate from required speed to rest

Label: Rest Time
Title: Time the rotary axis is at rest between cycles

Label: Moment of Inertia
Title: Rotational inertia of the load and mechanism

Label: Friction Torque
Title: Constant torque due to friction in the system

Label: Thermal Margin
Title: Extra margin to account for thermal effects

Label: Blower Pressure
Title: Blower pressure in inches of water

Label: Blower Fan Efficiency
Title: Blower fan efficiency as a percent

Label: Blower Motor Efficiency
Title: Blower motor efficiency as a percent
